auth.title: Login & Registration

register.title: Create an Account
register.photoFormats: Accepted formats: JPG, PNG, GIF, WEBP (max 5MB)

invalidFileType.title: Invalid file type
invalidFileType.description: Only JPG, PNG, GIF and WEBP files are accepted

errors.nameMinLength: Last name must contain at least 2 characters
errors.firstNameMinLength: First name must contain at least 2 characters
errors.passwordMinLength: Password must contain at least 8 characters
errors.minAge: You must be at least 13 years old to register
errors.acceptTermsRequired: You must accept the terms of use
errors.sectorRequired: Sector of activity is required for professionals
errors.biographyMinLength: Biography must contain at least 50 characters
errors.uploadContinueWithoutPhoto: Photo upload failed. We will continue registration without photo.
errors.registrationErrorDescription: An error occurred. Please try again.
errors.emailExistsDescription: An account already exists with this email address. Please log in or use a different address.
errors.pleaseVerifyEmail: Please verify your email before logging in. Check your inbox.
errors.contactSupport: Your account has been suspended. Contact support for more information.
errors.passwordError: Password does not meet security requirements (minimum 8 characters)
errors.emailExists: This email is already in use
errors.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters
errors.biographyTooShort: Biography must be at least 50 characters
errors.acceptTerms: You must accept the terms of use
errors.userNotFound: No account found with this email
errors.accountNotVerified: Please verify your email before logging in
errors.accountDisabled: Your account has been disabled. Contact the administrator.
errors.accountPending: Your professional account is pending validation
errors.accountSuspended: Your account is suspended. Contact the administrator.
errors.tooManyAttempts: Too many login attempts. Please try again later.

success.loginDescription: Welcome to Écho Algérie! You will be redirected...
success.professionalRegistration: Your professional account has been created. An administrator will validate it within 24-48 hours. You will receive a confirmation email.
success.visitorRegistration: Welcome to Écho Algérie! Your account has been created successfully. You can now explore the content.
success.registerDescription: Your account has been created successfully!

forgotPassword.title: Forgot Password
forgotPassword.description: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
forgotPassword.successDescription: If this address exists in our system, you will receive an email.
forgotPassword.emailSentDescription: If this email address is associated with an account, you will receive a reset link in a few minutes.
forgotPassword.checkSpam: Remember to check your spam folder if you don't receive the email.

resetPassword.title: New Password
resetPassword.description: Choose a new secure password for your account.
resetPassword.passwordHint: Minimum 8 characters with at least one uppercase, one lowercase and one number.
resetPassword.passwordRequirements: Password must contain at least one uppercase, one lowercase and one number
resetPassword.successDescription: Your password has been changed successfully. You can now log in.
resetPassword.redirecting: You will be redirected to the login page...
resetPassword.invalidToken: The reset link is invalid or has expired.
resetPassword.invalidTokenDescription: This reset link is invalid or has expired. Please request a new link.

artisanat.title_cramique_poterie_sud: Ceramics and pottery from the South

apropos.description_prserver_transmettre_riche: Preserve and transmit Algeria's rich cultural heritage to future generations.
apropos.description_rendre_culture_accessible: Make culture accessible to all, without geographical or economic barriers.
apropos.description_mettre_lumire_richesse: Highlight Algerian cultural wealth on the world stage.
apropos.culture_algrie_est:
Culture Algeria is an independent initiative led by enthusiasts 
                  of Algerian heritage, literature, cinema and art.
apropos.notre_mission_mettre:
Our mission: to highlight our country's cultural richness, 
                  facilitate access to works, connect stakeholders and promote transmission 
                  to younger generations.
